card.title: Usage Help
card.content: To get information about BART service advisories and alerts, say: Alexa, ask BART helper for updates. To inquire about fares between stations say a command such as: Alexa, ask BART helper for the fare from West Oakland to Richmond, or Alexa, ask BART helper for the fare from South San Francisco to Lake Merritt. To avoid confusion, try to pronounce the station names clearly.
